rec_title: The vet knows about the illnesses and treatments of all animals, so he is called omniscient
While treating them, the respective physicians must exercise patience. They have to identify the problems by examining them.
When animals are not well, they become quiet an inactive. Some may even groan. They also stop eating food.
The kite festival of Ahmedabad is so special because there is International kite festival at Ahmedabad organised by Gujarat state.
